3pIgnoreGenericCosmeticFilters.description: This will cause uBO to ignore all generic cosmetic filters.

3pIgnoreGenericCosmeticFiltersInfo.description: Describes the purpose of the 'Ignore generic cosmetic filters' feature.
3pIgnoreGenericCosmeticFiltersInfo.message:
Generic cosmetic filters are those cosmetic filters which are meant to apply on all web sites. Enabling this option will eliminate the memory and CPU overhead added to web pages as a result of handling generic cosmetic filters.

It is recommended to enable this option on less powerful devices.

settingsLastBackupPrompt.message: การสำรองข้อมูลครั้งล่าสุด

settingsLastRestorePrompt.message: การคืนค่าครั้งล่าสุด:

settingsNoCSPReportsPrompt.message: บล็อกรายงาน CSP

settingsNoLargeMediaPrompt.message: ปิดกั้นองค์ประกอบชนิด Media ที่มีขนาดใหญ่กว่า {{input}} KB

settingsNoScriptingPrompt.description: The default state for the per-site no-scripting switch
settingsNoScriptingPrompt.message: ปิดการใช้งาน JavaScript

settingsPageName.description: appears as tab name in dashboard
settingsPageName.message: การตั้งค่า

settingsPrefetchingDisabledPrompt.message: ปิดใช้งานการดึงข้อมูลล่วงหน้า (เพื่อป้องกันการเชื่อมต่อสำหรับคำขอเครือข่ายที่ถูกบล็อก)

settingsThemeAccent0Label.description: Label for checkbox to pick an accent color

settingsThemeLabel.description: Label for checkbox to enable a custom dark theme
settingsThemeLabel.message: รูปแบบการแสดงผล

settingsTooltipsPrompt.description: A checkbox in the Settings pane
settingsTooltipsPrompt.message: ปิดคำอธิบาย

settingsWebRTCIPAddressHiddenPrompt.message: ป้องกันไม่ให้ WebRTC รั่วไหลที่อยู่ IP ภายในเครื่อง

shortcutCapturePlaceholder.description: Placeholder string for input field used to capture a keyboard shortcut

shortcutsPageName.description: appears as tab name in dashboard

storageUsed.description: In Setting pane, renders as (example): Storage used: 13.2 MB
storageUsed.message: หน่วยความจำที่ใช้: {{value}} {{unit}}

subscribeButton.description: For the button used to subscribe to a filter list
subscribeButton.message: สมัครสมาชิก

supportFindSpecificButton.description: A clickable link in the filter issue reporter section

supportOpenButton.description: Text for button which open an external webpage in Support pane

supportPageName.description: appears as tab name in dashboard

supportReportSpecificButton.description: Text for button which open an external webpage in Support pane
supportReportSpecificButton.message: สร้างรายงานใหม่

supportS1H.description: Header of 'Documentation' section in Support pane
supportS1H.message: เอกสารอ้างอิง

supportS1P1.description: First paragraph of 'Documentation' section in Support pane
supportS1P1.message: Read the documentation at uBlock/wiki to learn about all of uBlock Origin's features.

supportS2H.description: Header of 'Questions and support' section in Support pane

supportS2P1.description: First paragraph of 'Questions and support' section in Support pane
supportS2P1.message: Answers to questions and other kinds of help support is provided on the subreddit /r/uBlockOrigin.

supportS3H.description: Header of 'Filter issues' section in Support pane

supportS3P1.description: First paragraph of 'Filter issues' section in Support pane
supportS3P1.message: Report filter issues with specific websites to the uBlockOrigin/uAssets issue tracker. Requires a GitHub account.

supportS3P2.description: Second paragraph of 'Filter issues' section in Support pane
supportS3P2.message: Important: Avoid using other similarly-purposed blockers along with uBlock Origin, as this may cause filter issues on specific websites.

supportS3P3.description: Third paragraph of 'Filter issues' section in Support pane
supportS3P3.message: Tips: Be sure your filter lists are up to date. The logger is the primary tool to diagnose filter-related issues.

supportS4H.description: Header of 'Bug report' section in Support pane
supportS4H.message: รายงานข้อผิดพลาด

supportS4P1.description: First paragraph of 'Bug report' section in Support pane
supportS4P1.message: Report issues with uBlock Origin itself to the uBlockOrigin/uBlock-issue issue tracker. Requires a GitHub account.

supportS5H.description: Header of 'Troubleshooting Information' section in Support pane

supportS5P1.description: First paragraph of 'Troubleshooting Information' section in Support pane
supportS5P1.message: Below is technical information that might be useful when volunteers are trying to help you solve a problem.

supportS5P2.description: Second paragraph of 'Troubleshooting Information' section in Support pane
supportS5P2.message: Important: Potentially private or sensitive information is redacted by default. Redacted information may make it more difficult to solve a problem.

supportS6Checkbox1.description: A checkbox to use for NSFW sites
supportS6Checkbox1.message: Label the web page as “NSFW” (“Not Safe For Work”)

supportS6H.description: Header of 'Report a filter issue' section in Support pane

supportS6P1S1.description: A paragraph in the filter issue reporter section
supportS6P1S1.message: To avoid burdening volunteers with duplicate reports, please verify that the issue has not already been reported.

supportS6P2S1.description: A paragraph in the filter issue reporter section
supportS6P2S1.message: Filter lists are updated daily. Be sure your issue has not already been addressed in the most recent filter lists.

supportS6P2S2.description: A paragraph in the filter issue reporter section
supportS6P2S2.message: Verify that the issue still exists after reloading the problematic webpage.

supportS6Select1.description: Label for widget to select type of issue

supportS6Select1Option0.description: An entry in the widget used to select the type of issue
supportS6Select1Option0.message: -- เลือกรายการ --

supportS6Select1Option1.description: An entry in the widget used to select the type of issue

supportS6Select1Option2.description: An entry in the widget used to select the type of issue

supportS6Select1Option3.description: An entry in the widget used to select the type of issue

supportS6Select1Option4.description: An entry in the widget used to select the type of issue

supportS6Select1Option5.description: An entry in the widget used to select the type of issue
supportS6Select1Option5.message: Malfunctions when uBlock Origin is enabled

supportS6Select1Option6.description: An entry in the widget used to select the type of issue

supportS6URL.description: Label for the URL of the page

toggleCosmeticFiltering.description: Label for keyboard shortcut used to toggle cosmetic filtering

toggleJavascript.description: Label for keyboard shortcut used to toggle no-scripting switch

unprocessedRequestTooltip.description: A warning which will appear in the popup panel if needed
unprocessedRequestTooltip.message: Could not filter properly at browser launch. Reload the page to ensure proper filtering.

whitelistApply.message: ใช้การเปลี่ยนแปลง

whitelistExportFilename.description: The default filename to use for import/export purpose

whitelistImport.message: นำเข้าและรวม

whitelistPageName.description: appears as tab name in dashboard
whitelistPageName.message: รายการยกเว้น

whitelistPrompt.description: A concise description of the 'Trusted sites' pane.
whitelistPrompt.message: ระบุไซต์ที่เชื่อถือได้เพื่อกำหนดว่าควรปิดการใช้งาน uBlock Origin ที่หน้าเว็บใด พิมพ์หนึ่งรายการต่อบรรทัด
